== Introduction ==
When I have decided to take the next move and contribute to Ubuntu Communities and turned from being a user who seeks help and asks Qs to an active advocate and contributor, I have unleashed my power, rolled up my sleeves and started to add my touches almost everywhere. Here is a list of the main areas that I have joined, helped and contributed heavily:

=== Projects ===
For the projects I am involved with, please see <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/amjjawad/Projects | My Projects]]</nowiki>

=== Brainstorming Area ===
==== Lubuntu ====
Founder and Team Leader of <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Brainstorming | Lubuntu Brainstorming Team]]</nowiki>

==== Ubuntu GNOME ====
Founder and Team Leader of <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGNOME/Brainstorming | Ubuntu GNOME Brainstorming Team]]</nowiki>.

=== Wiki Area ===
I'm the founder of '''Lubuntu One Stop Thread (LOST)''' on <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1844755 | Ubuntu Forums]]</nowiki> which had been converted to a Wiki Page ('''<nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/LubuntuLinks | LubuntuLinks]]</nowiki>''') and was the inspiration for yet another '''<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGNOME/OneStopPage | OneStopPage for Ubuntu GNOME]]</nowiki>''' and '''<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Kubuntu/KubuntuLinks | KubuntuLinks for Kubuntu]]</nowiki>''' as well.

For more details, please <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/amjjawad/WikiArea | see my full list of Wiki Edits/Involvements]]</nowiki>.

==== Role/Position ====
I'm currently the Founder and Team Leader of <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGNOME/DocumentationTeam | Ubuntu GNOME Wiki & Docs Team]]</nowiki>.

I am also helping <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/DocumentationTeam | Lubuntu Wiki Team]]</nowiki> to edit some pages.
